1.content:
Our tale begins with May in the outskirts of Greenwood village, a little known place in Johto.

Ash and all of her friends had gathered there for a special tournament, and May decided to go find a pokemart, but she became lost. Along the way, May had found an interesting building, once she walked in she noticed an old woman sipping tea.

"Excuse me Ms., could you tell me where the pokemart is?" May asked. The old woman's face was shadowy.

"Of course dear, but please have some tea." She said, holding up a second cup of tea.

May got an odd feeling, but decided to have some. As the brunette sat down and drank it, she got a funny feeling. She wasn't sick, but something was off.

"Um, thanks for the tea, but I gotta go!" May said nervously.

"Come back anytime dear...Ehehehe!"

May had no idea that the tea she drank had a curse on it, a curse that changes it's victim.

But how?
1.title: The cursed Tea

However, while May-Tank was grieving from the fact that can never be human again, Ash sat down by May-Tank's right side on the bed, as May-Tank felt Ash's fingerless glove-covered left hand on her right plump shoulder and Ash said, "May, are you okay?"

"~loud sob~ Okay? Does it look like I'm okay, Ash?!" May-Tank replied, as she looked away from Ash, worried about what he was going to say about her. But then, Ash looked at May-Tank with a concerned look on is face and answered, "No, May. You don't feel or look like your okay." Then, Ash unexpectedly put his fingerless glove-covered hand below May-Tank's chin, as he gently turned May-Tank's Miltank head to face him and said, "But I believe that you need to be cared by someone."

Hearing those words coming from Ash, May-Tank lowered her plump Miltank arms , as she slowly opened her blue eyes to look at Ash, since May-Tank was still 4 feet 4 inches tall. Then, with a few tears still rolling down her cheeks, May-Tank looked at Ash and asked, "W-Why are you treating me like what I used to be?"

But then, Ash then wiped the tears from May-Tank's face and answered, "Even if you have been transformed into a Miltank, you're still the same May I've known and cared about." It was then that May-Tank realized that Ash still cared about her, even if she was transformed into a plump Miltank, as May-Tank to quickly plunge her plump Miltank body into Ash, as May-Tank wrapped her chubby Miltank arms around Ash as best as she could in her plump Miltank body.

However, Ash could feel the weight of May-Tank's plump Miltank body on him, causing the male Pokemon Trainer to lean back some, as he began to stroke his right hand along the pink due on May-Tank's plump belly, doing his best to make May-Tank feel better.

"Then we better go downstairs and see if Brock will be able to cook them. We can explain this to the others when they see us."

"Don't you think they'll be a bit shocked?" Maytank asked, looking up at Ash. The Pallet Town native considered the thought.

"Probably, but it's not like this hasn't happened before. I once got turned into a Pikachu way back when I was in Johto."

"Really?" May-tank asked, amazed by the revelation. She wondered why he never brought it up in the past. Ash nodded in confirmation.

"Yeah, it was just temporary, so yours could be too. Either way we'll be here for you no matter what." Ash said. Once he was downstairs he looked around for Brock, but didn't see him. Scratching his baseball capped head, as sighed. "I wonder if Brock's still asleep..."

1141112212222.content:
Once more, May-Tank felt her pink furry belly growl once more, demanding to be fed to the brim with food. Of course, as May-Tank slowly stripped the bedsheets from her bovine form and sluggishly stood up from the bed, she could swear that she felt a little bigger than she was the previous night. "Okay... Is it just me...or am I getting fatter?" May-Tank thought to herself, placing her hooves hands upon her rounded pink stomach, feeling the extra layer of adipose added onto her bovine Pokemon physique.

However, she wasn't given much time to contemplate, as her stomach began to growl profusely once more, as if it was growing impatient. "Alright, alright! Geez, if this keeps up, I'll probably be as fat as a Snorlax by the end of the year." May-Tank thought to herself, as she slowly dismounted herself from the bed, carefully trying not to accidentally wake up Ash, Brock, or her little brother Max. However, when she began to approach the door, May-Tank began to notice that she now had a slight waddle in her gait, which made her inadvertently blush from such an awkward form of movement.

"*sigh* I just hope you're right about this being temporary, Ash." May-Tank thought to herself, as she momentarily looked back at the slumbering Ash Ketchum before presuming to open the door. However, with now sporting a pair of less than dexterous digits, May-Tank quickly realized that simply turning a doorknob was not going to be as simple as it used to be when she was human, as she continuously fidgeted with the doorknob with her stubby hoofed fingers for several minutes, sticking her bovine tongue out to the side as if she was heavily concentrating with all her might and persistence.

"C'mon, c'mon, you stupid door. Open already!" May-Tank mumbled, becoming somewhat irritated at such an insignificant task becoming such a labored chore in her chubby bovine hands. Fortunately, after a few minutes of struggling, May-Tank managed to get the door open on her own, hearing the inner mechanisms of the doorknob emit a satisfying "click". From there, May-Tank displayed a satisfied grin on her slightly plump snout, as she began to push the door open, just enough for her to pass through unhindered. Finally out of the bedroom, May-Tank waddled her way down the hallway toward the PokeBlock machines.

-----

Eventually, after a few minutes of lumbering her way through the halls of the Pokemon Center, May-Tank finally came upon the PokeBlock vending machines from last night, which inadvertently made her stomach growl even louder than before. "Well, at least these PokeBlock machines are free to everyone." May-Tank said to herself, where she began to pull on the lever attached to the PokeBlock machine, allowing a substantial amount of red and blue PokeBlocks to spew forth from the vending machine.

From there, May-Tank began to viciously devour the PokeBlocks with a sense of gluttonous gusto, savoring the processed edibles in her stuffed pink furry cheeks before swallowing the chewed up PokeBlocks, letting the processed food fall into her stomach and digestive tract. Then, she began to go for more PokeBlocks, continuing this cycle of gluttony for almost half an hour, filling her Pokemon stomach to it's absolute limit.

By the time she was finally finished feasting, May-Tank laid back against the PokeBlock machine, her stomach bloated and stuffed to nearly bursting with digesting PokeBlocks. And yet, as she sat there, tubby bovine legs spread out to accommodate for her burdened belly, May-Tank began to gently rub her belly in slow circles, which gave off this euphoric blissful feeling as she continued to gently massage her bloated tummy. "Hmm... I wonder if Ash likes a girl with some fat on them..." May-Tank absentmindedly thought to herself, which inadvertently made her snap herself out of such a stupor, violently shaking her Miltank head in response and thought, "Wait a minute, why am I thinking of stuff like this!?"

"*sigh* Keep yourself together, May. This whole thing with you being a Miltank might be temporary." May-Tank thought to herself, just as another thought crept into her mind as she said, "But... What if this isn't temporary? What if I'm stuck like this for the rest of my life?!" The thought alone was enough to make her more worried than usual, as she tried shaking those negative thoughts out of her mind. But then, May-Tank suddenly heard some footsteps approaching her current position, but who it was, however....

1311.content:
As soon as Brock let his new Nidoqueen out of its Pokéball, May started to feel weird, as if her consciousness was drifting away. When that feeling ceased, May couldn't see the inside of the Pokéball she was transformed into anymore. Instead, she could see the outside world like normal, with Brock standing right in front of her. Confused, she took a quick look around, only to notice her body felt much heavier. She soon realized that because she had caught the Nidoqueen, she could control its body directly from the Pokéball. She screamed in surprise, letting out a loud "Queeeeeeeeeeeeeeen !" which startled Brock.

"Whoa, hey, calm down ? What's wrong, Nidoqueen ?"

May looked back up and saw Brock. She calmed down and said :

"Brock, it's me, May ! I drank some weird tea from an old lady and transformed into the Pokéball you just found, so I can control the body of the Nidoqueen you just captured ! You have to help me !
-...What's wrong with you, are you trying to tell me something ?"

May gasped in surprise. She forgot that being in the body of a Pokémon, she couldn't directly speak to other people. She tried to think of another way to let her friend know of her predicament, and soon found one : She crouched down and wrote something on the ground using her huge arms. Brock read the message as May was writing it :

"Hmm ? What are you writing down ? I... Am... May... Wait, "I am May" ? You mean, you are May ?!"

The young girl-turned-Nidoqueen nodded, relieved she finally managed to explain the situation. She continued to write down what had happened to her, until Brock knew of the whole situation.

"My gosh, this is so weird... So that old lady transformed you, huh ? I guess there's only one thing we can do then. We go back to that building and ask her to change you back ! Lead the way !"

May sighed in relief, happy to see that things were looking rather good. She was still a Pokéball controlling a Nidoqueen, but at least she could communicate and managed to let Brock know of her problem. The two youngsters eventually reached the strange building the old lady was living in, and entered it (May's body obviously couldn't fit through the door, so Brock had to call back Nidoqueen and let her out again after entering). They saw the old lady sitiing on the ground, still sipping tea.

"So you're the one who transformed my friend into a Pokéball, right ?
-Hmmm ? Oh, a new visitor ! Welcome, ehehehehehe ! Anyway, I have no idea what you are talking about, I never met any friend of yours.
-Don't play dumb with me ! The girl you gave tea to earlier, after she asked you where the Poké-Mart was ! You transformed her into a Pokéball !
-Oh, this young girl ! Ehehehehehehehe ! I see, so my tea transformed her into a Pokéball... What is your point, young man ?
-It's obvious : Change her back right now, or we'll call the police !
-Now, now, there's no need to get so angry. How about a game ? Your Pokémon against my Gengar. If you win, I'll change your friend back and turn myself in. But if you lose, I'll transform you into something too ! How about that ?"

Brock and May thought about it for a while. There was no way for them to know whether the old lady was going to keep her word or not, but they had to run fast if they were to try and run away. They decided to...

"All right, I accept, but only

13232.content:
May was a bit confused by that old woman and the tea she gave her, but paid little attention to it as she headed towards the nearest Poké Mart. But while she was on her way, she noticed that not only was the odd sensation she felt back when she drank that weird tea did not fade as she expected it to, but it was actually even more pronounced. She tried to ignore it and press on, but it soon grew to the point that she started to feel dizzy and lose her balance.

Then the changes started. May could feel her head becoming strangely lighter, as if it was becoming hollow. She could also swear there was a growing hole in her neck, but she was too concerned with the increasing stiffness of her body to care about it yet. She could barely move a muscle, and it seemed her arms decided to glue themselves to her body against her own will. Her legs also started to stretch out as long as they could, and it also seemed her entire body was shrinking, too. She could feel her gloves slipping off of her hands, her feet slipping out of her shoes, and her clothes grew baggier by the second, but she had no longer any control over her body, and couldn't do anything about it. Her head also started stretching out as far as it could, and it didn't take long for her limbs to melt into her body and disappear, and for her body to stretch out sideways. Her vision faded as her eyes turned into oval-shaped, light-blue jewels of sorts. The scared young girl tried to call for help, but couldn't as her mouth was forcibly opening as wide as it could, and stretching out even wider. The hole in her neck also grew, to the point that there was a huge gap in her head. Said gap split into two smaller gaps as the area between her eyes stretched down and reached the bottom what now used to be her head. Her skin and flesh got thinner, and her entire body turned white. May could feel her consciousness fading away as well, and despite her best efforts to stay awake, she passed out. Finally, she shrank in size some more, getting swallowed up by her clothes, and her transformation was complete: May had just transformed into Jasmine's pair of white sandals.

Surprisingly, she came to a few minutes ago, and realized her predicament as soon as she noticed that not only was the only thing she could see was the red fabric of her now empty clothes, but her vision was split into two "screens", corresponding to the jewels of the sandals she had turned into. Much to her own suprise, she could also hear just fine, as if she still had ears. However, she couldn't move an inch, and much less communicate. She attributed her transformation to the tea she had been given by the old woman, but was in such shock that she could barely understand her situation for a moment.

"I can't believe this is happening to me... This must be a dream. There's no way this can possibly be real. People don't spontaneously turn into sandals just from drinking a cup of tea... I gotta figure out how to turn back... But how can I even get through to people in thi- or rather these forms?!"

However, it didin't take long for something to happen and throw May off her train of thought. But what is it?
13232.title: Jasmine's sandals

choices: She had seen some friends and was running to meet them.
132321.content:
Before she could think about her situation much longer, May heard footsteps heading her way. These belonged to Jasmine, a young Gym Leader who also decided to participate in the upcoming tournament. She had rented a room in a hotel, and was on her way back there, when she saw May's empty clothes on the ground, and started searching through them.

"Hmm? Wait, are those... clothes? What are empty clothes doing here? That's strange, it almost looks like they were worn just recently, as if whoever was wearing them suddenly vanished... Let's see if there's anything left inside them for me to figure out what happened... Hm? Sandals? What are those sandals doing here? ...And they look just like mine, too! This is so strange. I have a bad feeling about this, but it might be just my imagination. The weather is pretty windy today, so maybe these clothes just fell here by accident. Besides, people don't magically transform into sandals. Not to mention my own sandals are starting to fall apart from all my walking... I might as well pick those clothes up and take them."

With those words, Jasmine picked up May's empty clothes and the "May-sandals", and brought them with her to her hotel room. This was a rather unpleasant experience for May, whose double vision combined with the momentum of Jasmine's walk made her sight very shaky. When the young Gym Leader returned to her room, she folded May's clothes neatly and put them on a nearby chair, then left the "Maydals" near the hotel's bathroom, before entering and taking a shower. May was relieved to finally be in a safe and stable spot, but soon realized something: Jasmine didn't bring her to her room and near the bathroom door just for decoration, and she would surely wear them!

Her fears were realized as Jasmine finished her shower a few minutes later. She slipped out of her bath slippers, put on the "Maydals", then left to take a walk. May thought she had it rough earlier, but this was even worse. She felt like she was on a rollercoaster, and her double vision made it even worse. Constantly seeing part of Jasmine's feet and feeling her weight on her back didn't help matters in the slightest, and the cherry on top of the awful sundae was the tapping sound she made with every step.

"Oh my gosh, I can't believe this is happening to me... If I had a face, I would certainly get sick... This can't go on forever, I need to turn back! But how am I gonna be able to talk to her? If only I had been turned into a pair of speakers, I would at least have been able to talk to her, or something... Wait, what's she doing? Is she stopping? Kyaaaaaah, she's running! Noooooooo, please stop this!"

Indeed, Jasmine was starting to run. But why was she running?
132321.title: Jasmine comes accross the May-sandals

choices: She was running away from a creepy man who was chasing her.
1323212.content: If it wasn't to meet some friends, then why was Jasmine suddenly running?
1323212.title: Something else

choices: She was transforming into sandals, like May.
13232121.content:
Although the loud, constant and frantic sound of the "Maydals" hitting the ground made it hard for May to tell what was going on, she could at least make out a panting sound, and two voices: Jasmine, and a strange man.

Indeed, a dirty, disheveled-looking man was running after the young Gym Leader. She had seen the man sitting on a bench, his head down as if he were sad or in pain. Worried, Jasmine asked him if he was OK, but the man abruptly raised his head, startling the young girl. He suddenly grinned ear to ear, but it was a very crazed, almost unnatural grin. His eyes were bloodshot as well, and he was missing several teeth. He got up and asked Jasmine to come with him, with the slurred voice of a drunkard. Jasmine got scared and started running away, with the creepy man in hot pursuit. She tried to call one of her Pokémon to help her deal with the madman or run away from him, but realized she forgot her Poké Balls back at the hotel room.

Now, both of them were part of a rather long chain of people running, with Jasmine running away from the madman, said madman actually trying to catch her, a few policemen who were trying to stop the madman, the policemen's Growlithes running near their trainers, and a few more concerned people who were trying to help the police. In the middle of it all was May, who could do nothing to help, and only "enjoy" the wild ride Jasmine was unintentionnally taking her on. Despite the deafening tapping sound the "Maydals" made, she could hear both protagonists' voices...

"Hah, hah... Nooooo! Don't come near me!
-C'mon, young lady, I'm not gonna hurt ya! I just wanna show you something! Hehehehehehe... Ow! Stupid Growlithe, would ya stop biting my leg?! And y'all jerks, stop chasing me already! I'm just trying to have a talk with that little girl there!
-Kyaaaaaa! Stay away from me!"

The young Gym Leader started running even faster. Although this was extremely unpleasant for May, the young trainer-turned-sandals was too worried about Jasmine to care, and could only cheer her on silently.

Eventually, the policemen and the people trying to help them failed to keep up with the madman and Jasmine, and fell behind. Jasmine instinctively ran towards a dark alleyway in an attempt to outrun her pursuer, but right around the corner, the madman's Machamp was waiting, ready to ambush the young Gym Leader. It did so with ease, grabbing her from behind and using its arms to prevent her from moving as well as cover her mouth. It used just enough strength to completely prevent Jasmine from moving, without hurting her. The madman soon caught up with his young target.

"Good job Machamp! You did extremely well!
-Mmmmhhh! Mmmmmmmmmhhh! Mmmhhmmhhh!
-Shhhhh, don't be so scared... As I said, I'm not gonna hurt ya! I'm just gonna show ya something! Hehehehyahahahaha!"

The madman then pulled out a small bottle, filled with a strange liquid. May couldn't see what was going on very well, but she was at least able to identify the liquid as tea, which looked very similar to the very tea that transformed her into sandals. However, she couldn't see the tea clearly enough to tell whether it was the same tea, or a different one. All she knew is that this was definitely another transforming tea, because otherwise the madman wouldn't have gone through the trouble of running after Jasmine to give it to her. May figured the madman must be working for the old woman who gave her the tea, though she couldn't figure out why an old woman would ever want to use cursed tea to transform people. In any case, she was starting to get really scared for Jasmine, and instinctively tried to scream at the madman to stop, but to no avail. The madman opened the bottle of tea, then in the blink of an eye, Machamp removed his hand from Jasmine's mouth, and the madman leaped at her to forcefeed her the tea. Jasmine really didn't want to drink it, but found herself forced to swallow it so as to not choke. After she drank it all, Machamp let her go, and Jasmine fell to the ground, coughing. The madman was staring at her with a triumphant but no less crazed grin.

"Hyahahahaha! This tea there tastes nice, doesn't it? But just ya wait, that's not the best part!"

When Jasmine stopped coughing, she realized she was starting to feel an odd sensation throughout her body. It was a weird tingling feeling, coupled with a bit of lightheadedness. Soon, she started to feel dizzy, and couldn't bring herself to stand back up. May couldn't see it, but she could feel it due to the way the young Gym Leader was moving her legs. It didn't take long for the tea's true effects to show, but how was she transforming?
13232121.title: The transforming tea

132321212.content: If Jasmine wasn't transforming into sandals like May was, then how was she transforming?

1323212121.content: Was she getting older or younger?

choices: Go ahead, I wanna continue the story.
I'd like to choose her age, please.
13232121212.content: One possibly final question: Do you want to choose how much younger she'll end up, or do you want to just go on with the story and let me choose?
13232121212.title: Younger

choices: The policemen caught up with the madman and arrested him
132321212121.content:
The tea's true effects soon showed, as Jasmine was starting to shrink in both size and age right before the madman and his Machamp's eyes. Her hands were getting smaller and her fingers were getting shorter. Her feet likewise shrank, with her toes getting shorter. May could even see the minor details of Jasmine's feet changing, with her skin moving and changing as if it were a wave on an ocean. Eventually, she couldn't see her feet anymore, though a sudden reflexive movement from Jasmine flipped one of her Maydals over, allowing May to see the rest of the young Gym Leader's regression. Her entire body was shrinking, and her dress soon became huge on her. Her hair grew shorter, causing her hair decorations to fall off. Her facial features changed, with her eyes getting bigger and squinting ever so slightly, her cheeks becoming puffier, and her face overall becoming baby-like. She also became chubbier, due to baby fat returning. Her voice was also becoming more high-pitched, and her pleads for help soon devolved into wails, as Jasmine's fear was taking over her. Soon, her transformation was complete, and Jasmine was left as a wailing infant swimming in her now oversized dress.

"Hyahahaha! Isn't it great? My mistress loves brewing transformation teas like these and spreading them around, and you were lucky enough to be given this one; now you can start your life anew! What a great present, right? I know you love this!"

He then started to cackle maniacally. May was saddened to see Jasmine as a baby, scared out of her wits and wailing away.

"Poor Jasmine... If only I weren't a pair of sandals right now, I'd teach him a lesson! But I can't do anything...
- Wait, what's this? I can hear a voice in my head... Is this... telepathy?
- What?! I can hear Jasmine's voice! Can you hear me?
- Yes, I can! I have no idea how this is possible, but it seems we can communicate telepathically.
- Whaaaaaaaaa?! This is crazy, how can this happen? Does it have to do with the tea?
- You've also drank some transforming tea?
- Yeah, I met an old woman in a building, and she gave me a cup of some weird tea. I drank it, and next thing I knew, I turned into those sandals. I guess that crazy guy works for her, since he fed you tea that transformed you into a baby.
